name: Ramyashree Nandakumar
title: Full Stack Developer
summary: Experienced Full-Stack Developer with 4+ years of expertise in backend development, microservices, API integrations, and cloud-based solutions. Proficient in Java (Spring Boot, Hibernate, JPA), Node.js (NestJS, Express.js), React.js, AWS (Serverless, S3, DynamoDB, Lambda), and PL/SQL. Strong background in designing enterprise payment systems, CI/CD pipelines, containerized deployments (Docker, Kubernetes), and AI/ML applications. Passionate about building scalable, secure, and high-performing software solutions.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science

education.institution: CMR Institute of Technology, Bangalore, India

details: Designed a scalable file storage system, enabling AWS S3, on-premise server, or Oracle DB selection, improving data accessibility and storage efficiency.
Reduced Oracle DB storage overhead by 40% by offloading large files to AWS S3, improving system performance.
Engineered automated environment configurations, enabling seamless cloud bucket management, reducing manual intervention by 80%.
Engineered and optimized backend APIs in Node.js & AWS, increasing data processing efficiency by 35%.
Developed GraphQL services, reducing API response times by 40% and enhancing real-time access.
Facilitated cross-functional collaboration to optimize Finance, Payments, and Student Management data flows, improving system interoperability.
Designed and integrated microservices to process DfE (Department for Education) payloads, automating 80% of manual admissions data entry.
Architected a real-time event-driven data pipeline leveraging PL/SQL queues & AWS SNS, ensuring 99.9% data synchronization accuracy.
Enabled automated ERP system publishing, reducing data entry time by 50%.

achievements.role: Ellucian Payment Services – Microservices & Serverless Payments
details: Led development of a centralized payment service, consolidating Touchnet, Flywire, and Payment Client integrations, reducing failure rates by 30%.
Implemented AWS Serverless frameworks for payments, scaling transaction processing by 50% and improving uptime to 99.9%.
Enhanced microservices resilience by applying circuit breaker patterns & retry logic, reducing payment failures by 25%

projects.title: Enterprise Inventory Management System
achievements: Built a high-efficiency inventory system, improving stock tracking and order fulfillment, reducing inventory errors by 40%.
Enhanced backend processing with Core Java multithreading & Streams API, cutting query execution time by 30%.
Deployed with Kubernetes & Docker, ensuring auto-scaling and reducing downtime by 50%.

projects.title: Manufacturing Process Optimization System – Arihant Ispat
achievements: Engineered a manufacturing system, optimizing production workflows and reducing material handling inefficiencies by 25%.
Applied TSP-based scheduling, improving task execution efficiency by 35%.
Structured a Spring Boot backend, enhancing data consistency and retrieval speed.

projects.title: Automated Image Captioning System – AI for Visual Understanding
achievements: Created an AI-driven captioning model, enhancing image-text pairing accuracy, achieving a BLEU score of 0.67.
Processed 120,000+ images, increasing dataset efficiency and training speed by 30%.
Integrated ResNet50 with an attention-based LSTM, refining text generation by 20%.

projects.title: Credit Card Fraud Detection – AI for Financial Security
achievements: Developed fraud detection models, boosting precision to 95% and lowering false positives by 30%.
Utilized SMOTE for class balancing, improving anomaly detection accuracy by 20%.
Optimized Random Forest & Gradient Boosting models, reducing fraud classification errors by 25%.

awards.title: High-Impact Award
awards.description: Led a project transition ensuring 99.9% uptime and reducing operational costs by 25%.
